function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decreased noise levels during lockdown may lead to an increase in human interaction and activity, contributing to the potential spread of contagious diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion due to heightened human interaction and activity in response to reduced noise levels","Mitigation":"Implement targeted public health measures and communication strategies to address the potential increase in human interaction and activity","Technologies":"Public health communication platforms, contact tracing technology, and targeted community outreach","People":"Residents in urban environments, individuals staying at home during lockdown, and public health officials","Owner":"Public health authorities, community leaders, and urban planning organizations"}]}
